column4: hey i wondered if someone could help me. im installing ubuntu, and im at the partition screen, i wanna dualboot with windows,so i resized that partition, now i go to make the swap partition, but do i select Primary or Logical :S
well as far as i know dont i only need to make swap parttion and then main ubuntu parition?
you only want to create 3 primaries & 1 extended - & then make as many logical partitions as you need in the extended
